short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to make PlayHQ work for cricket scorers and managers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PlayHQ needs a bit of help to work for scorers, managers and admins.

This initial release offers a couple of features:
- The ability to backup a scoring session so that you can recover the scorecard should it all go wrong.
- The ability to view the game settings for a game (e.g. grace period)
